reviews.title: Only decent 5 star I could find in this area

reviews.title: Five star in everyway

reviews.text: Dinner was fantastic and breakfast just a brilliant we will be going back again for another night away from London.
reviews.title: Superb renovation
just to get away
reviews.text: We loved the Linden House, we only had one night and stayed in one of the classic rooms - the windows cut out any road noise and the room, although small was definitely up to standard, pure luxury for a reasonable price. The breakfast was delicious and the service as you'd expect from a 5 star, we will come and stay for dinner next time!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great room and top service. Good breakfast too and no rush to kick us out early! Very pleasant staff and very accommodating.
reviews.title: Lovely new venue

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from a weekend stop-over at this fabulous hotel. We started off with a wonderfully kind greeting from the restaurant manager, who was extremely helpful and courteous. The room was brilliant - great decor, super design and spotlessly clean too. However, we were soon downstairs enjoying drinks with friends in front of the log-burner, which was such a welcome break from the bitter coldness outside.
reviews.title: BEST TOP-CLASS RESTAURANT AND ROOM STAY!

reviews.text: The food in the restaurant was enjoyed by everyone - every course was truly stunning, and the choices of wines and champagne were superb. The restaurant had a fanastic buzz, and we all could not believe how busy it was - large tables were still walking in late into the night.
reviews.title: Excellent value for a first rate hotel and restaurant

reviews.text: The room was very peaceful, the bed was extremely comfy and the bath and shower were amazing. Room 3 really was one of those rooms you just wanted to stay in for longer!
reviews.title: Lovely hotel in a great area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was great the next day - again the food was fantastic and the service excellent.
reviews.title: Fabulous!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Came here for my wedding anniversary a few weeks ago and loved it. Staff were excellent, decor is amazing and food was exceptional. Was so pleased that came back for Sunday lunch yesterday. Expectations were exceeded. Sunday menu had no Chicken listed so we asked and they were happy to provide chicken roast. Little things like this that show they care about their customers . I will be coming back here very soon!
reviews.title: 5 stars

reviews.text: Had a really great meal with outstanding food at very reasonable rates. We stayed over night the room was very well equipped and had every thing you would want with style. Only small thing was a bright green light in the celing which lit the room. Also very very hot needed a fan. Insteed had the window open and there was traffic. That said would still run back
reviews.title: Dinner and overnight worth it everytime

reviews.text: What a fantastic addition to our area. Long may it stay! Great bar, restaurant, rooms, friendly staff and beautiful interiors make for a really special place for us to enjoy a bit of style in little old Stansted. Thank goodness you came!
reviews.title: Fabulous place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were lucky enough to stay here on a bargain weekend. Food was excellent, room was fabulous - excellent bath and shower, service was really good - not overbearing but attentive. Will definitely come again. No noise from the airport (this was my main worry) and we found parking across the road. Spotlessly clean. Will book again.
reviews.title: Could Not Fault

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Linden House on our wedding night this April. We had been for drinks a few times before in the bar, but had never stayed. The staff were very helpful and made our check-in very discreet, as I was wearing a wedding dress. We were very happy with the room (room 3). the decor is gorgeous and they have clearly thought everything through, for example the position of the TV. I also very much liked the brand of toiletries that are provided and the fridge of fresh milk in the hall, rather than sachets.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel and Restaurant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: one night stay with evening meal and full breakfast - room was lovely, great bath and shower, just as well because my wife is a real fusspot - dinner was awesome, this is where i am really fussy, had monkfish, perfectly cooked - service was excellent from all staff - a really good all-round experience.
reviews.title: cracking hotel

reviews.text: Linden House has differentiated itself in quality, design and service. It boasts one of the best restaurant within miles around the hertfordshire/essex border. Myself and my wife enjoyed a date night special with a saturday night meal in the restaurant. Menu was eye catching and supplemented with an extensive wine menu. The restaurant was busy but not overbearing loud. We were booked into a superior deluxe bedroom. It was quiet despite being located above the restaurant. Design details on the room were exceptional especially the Conran iPod speaker system. Onsuite bathroom boasted a lovely big stand alone bath and an extremely powerful shower. Recommended for overnight stay or a cosy dinner. This is definite for mum & dads to escape without the kids.
reviews.title: Distinctly different and a must for date night (without the kids)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just experienced the most wonderful short stay at Linden House, the hotel is superbly decorated, the bedroom was so beautiful, immaculately clean, and they have brilliant staff...what more could you ask for! The restaurant atmosphere and food was perfect and not expensive for the quality. Finally the breakfast is the best we have ever eaten. Well done to Linden House for getting it so right we will go back again.
reviews.title: The most wonderful short stay!

reviews.text: Friendly staff, comfortable bed, big warm shower, well cooked food, room was as good as the website pictures!
reviews.title: Linden House

reviews.text: We stayed for one night in this establishment, and were very impressed with the whole experience. The Classic room, which we chose was of the highest standard, and must be the most modern and cleanest room we have ever stayed in.
reviews.title: Good Weekend experience
